Package com.intellij.dvcs.repo

Class VcsRepositoryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.dvcs.repo.VcsRepositoryManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable, VcsListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class VcsRepositoryManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Disposable, VcsListener
    VcsRepositoryManager creates,stores and updates all Repositories information using registered VcsRepositoryCreator extension point in a thread safe way.
